OOC: Yeah I forgot where it was. Blowing there own door open by being too trigger happy would be classic.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:              Like the first this one attempted to run, but the fire power was just too much for it. It disappears in a puff of powerdery fine soot, which is also pulverized by the power of the blasts! (OOC: It has died)
   
  OOC: If you guys remember he was actually sitting on the bay door, near dead center. I do not know how strong that door is but I would imagine that the fusion blast, machine gun blasts and rockets stand a serious chance of actually blowing a good sized hole in the door. And since you guys are now underneath some magma ... 
   
  It's not my door, and I will leave the results up to you, but I must admit, the thought of it leaves me in stitches! >:)
   
  Preston
  

  ----- Original Message ----
From: Richard Allen <roborick007@...>
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, February 21, 2008 1:22:02 AM
Subject: Re: Black Fortress

      ::Dark Rodimus/Jhiaxus/ Zarak::
   
  The three of them head for the shuttle bay. They dont take long to get there. Rodimus and Jhiaxus begin to look around while Zarak reconnects with Scorponok.
   
  Jhiaxus: Where is the blasted thing?
   
  Rodimus: It hides well. Good hunting.
   
  Scorponok: Over there on the wall!
   
  Scorponok swings his tail over his should and fires a fusion blast. Jhiaxus follows up with rapid fire from his machine gun. Rodimus fires one of his over-shoulder rockets.
   
  Rodimus: Lots of heavy fire on one small enemy. I love it.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@ yahoo.com> wrote:
      Perceptor:

"TRy to destroy the onme in shuttle bay"said the male"I'll lock down 
everything there and later destroy the fugitive electronic -roach "

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@ ...> 
wrote:
>
> ----- Original Message ---- 
> From: Richard Allen <roborick007@ ...> 
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com 
> Sent: Tuesday, February 19, 2008 8:49:10 PM 
> Subject: Re: Black Fortress 
> 
> ::Dark Rodimus:: 
> 
> Rodimus watches as his blast misses and the spy heads into the duct 
system. 
> 
> Rodimus: Infestation. Do we have anything to destroy it in the 
ductwork? 
> 
> 
> OOC: Keep in mind, there are still only two spider spies - one here 
and one in the shuttle bay. I was just trying to give you a visual of 
roaches scattering. I don't think the spider spies can procreate or 
clone themselves .. athough that is an interesting idea! :)
> 
> Preston
>
